pullrequest.title: Use one-liners as default installation method for gazebo7 in Linux and Mac

content.raw:
I tested on a fresh virtual machine. Here's the output when running the one-liner: it gives an intro message, then starts installing homebrew. This pops up a dialog asking to install the command-line tools and the terminal prompts the user for a password to `chown /usr/local`. I don't know if we want to add an extra console message before installing brew to explain what's happening?

![Screen Shot 2016-01-25 at 6.05.02 PM.png](data/bitbucket.org/repo/RMMxjX/images/587557905-Screen_Shot_2016-01-25_at_6.05.02_PM.png)
